m_szDocTitle: Merkel calls for sustainable development partnership with China - China.org.cn
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Merkel calls for sustainable development partnership with China E-mail Xinhua,  July 8, 2014 Adjust font size: 下载安装Flash播放器 Visiting German Chancellor Angela Merkel on Tuesday called on Germany and China to take the lead in establishing a partnership to promote sustainable development. Sustainable development does not mean sacrificing economic growth, but an opportunity for countries to have more resources and a better life,Merkel said in a speech on sustainable development at China's prestigious Tsinghua University. In Germany, a quarter of power is generated
